page.title: 17Bradford's First Asian Mayor
page.content: ...and how he would hope to improve Bradford's image. {Councillor Ajeeb}agreed that Bradford was a poor city and one of the poorest in Britain. He promised that{he would do his utmost to improve {Bradford's image,}at home and abroad. In order to achieve this and put Bradford back on the road to economic recovery, he said he has plans to attract small industries to Bradford thus producing more jobs. He also intends to improve its environment.
